title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors

Keep your yard safer and more peaceful with this solar-powered ultrasonic repellent designed to deter snakes and other unwelcome wildlife—without chemicals, odors, or traps. Built with premium materials and IP44 water resistance, each unit delivers long-lasting performance in all seasons.

Key features:
- Ultrasonic technology: Emits sonic pulses and vibrations every 30 seconds via a buzzer working method to disturb and deter snakes from settling in your space.
- Wide coverage: Each stake covers up to 7,000 sq. ft., ideal for lawns, gardens, farms, and campsites.
- Chemical-free and family-friendly: Safe for children and pets; no poisons or sprays.
- Solar-powered convenience: Integrated solar panel charges by day for continuous, cord-free operation.
- Durable build: Premium materials and IP44 waterproof rating provide reliable outdoor performance.
- Multi-animal deterrence: Helps repel deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels.
- Frequency and interval: Operates at approximately 400 ± 100 Hz with consistent pulses every 30 seconds.

What to expect:
- Repellent effectiveness typically builds over 2–4 weeks as animals learn to avoid the protected area. For best results, use the full set to create overlapping coverage around your perimeter.

Simple setup:
1. Pre-charge: Turn the devices on and place them in direct sunlight for 4–5 hours before first use.
2. Install: Insert each stake so the head sits about 2 inches above the soil to keep the solar panel clear and vibrations effective.
3. Space strategically: Distribute units to create continuous coverage across your yard or garden.

Specifications:
- Technology: Ultrasonic/sonic vibration via buzzer
- Emission interval: Every 30 seconds
- Effective range: Up to 7,000 sq. ft. per unit
- Frequency: 400 ± 100 Hz
- Power source: Solar
- Waterproof rating: IP44
- Safety: Safe for children and pets; chemical-free

Tips for best performance:
- Ensure good sun exposure daily; initial full charge improves first-week performance.
- Firm, well-contacted soil transmits vibrations better than loose sand or very rocky ground.
- Keep the solar panel clean and unobstructed for optimal charging.

Choose the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for an easy, eco-friendly way to protect your outdoor spaces with maximum durability and minimal effort.
